articles.title: Honkai Star Rail has 10 million users and it's not even out yet - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Honaki: Star Rail isn't out until 26th April, 2023, but it already boasts 10 million users. That's according to develop…
articles.content:
Honaki: Star Rail isn't out until 26th April, 2023, but it already boasts 10 million users.
That's according to developer HoYoverse, which announced the milestone on its social media channels over t… [+1365 chars]
